css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-8610b088-u{padding-top:48px;padding-right:32px;padding-left:35px;min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-8610b088-u{padding-top:72px;padding-right:55px;padding-left:55px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-8610b088-u{padding-top:30px;padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-8610b088-u{padding-top:15px;padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px;}}
